name: Cookie Crush! Match 3 Game
description:
Play the amazing Cookie Crush Match 3 game and join millions of happy players in this addicting puzzle game!

Join the exciting journey across the sugary worlds and play through thousands of levels to complete the challenge that is set at the start of the level. Swipe and match tasty candy, cakes, and jelly, reach the target and win cool prizes! Begin your adventure today and explore plenty of delicious worlds and levels.

For all the fans of online board games, get ready to become addicted to this popular crush game. Play now & match the sweet cookies to clear the board and win! Get incredible boosts and power-ups. Spin the wheel & win free daily prizes.

Play this sweet crush game anywhere you like - no WiFi connection required! Crush delicious cookies and enjoy the addictive matching game! Make sure to blast mouthwatering desserts and cookies. Smash and pop candy drops and win sweet gifts and rewards.


How to play
* Crush & match 3 candies and cakes to burst and win points.
* Collect prizes & coins in our daily bonus reward!
* Boost your experience with awesome power-ups.
* Play and enjoy thousands of puzzles in this fun addicting game
* Play online or offline-no internet connection or wifi needed.

Travel across the cookie map and discover thousands of fun levels filled with great puzzles and bonuses. Play the best match 3 game, swipe and match tasty candy and jelly. Achieve the level target within limited moves by matching three or more yummy treats - it’s so easy! Join the fun and adventure, and unlock unique boosters that will help you crush delicious cookies, beat the challenges and win levels. Don’t wait any longer to join the Cookie Crush mania - it’s extremely fun for both kids & adults!


Play the game and help Alex clear levels and collect awesome gifts and prizes. Make sure to spin the wheel daily to earn your bonus. Download this fun and addicting game for FREE!


Enjoy the best match 3 game features:
- Beautiful graphics and effects.
- Thousands of fun levels filled with cookies, pastry treats and sweet rewards.
- Completely free to play and a super addictive matching game.
- This game is a treat for the entire family - kids and adults will enjoy this easy and relaxing game.
- Create massive candy explosions by creating combos:
- Swap & link 3 candy drops to create a line blast.
- Match 4 candies of the same color to get a striped treat.
• Match 5 cake treats in an L or T shape to get a sugar bomb.
• Match 5 sweet treats in a row to get a special colorful rainbow cake.
• Connect 2 special sweets to create a giant explosion!

Cookie Crush Match 3 is the best puzzle game, play online or offline-no internet connection is required! Pop the candy drops and clear levels.
Go on a sugary adventure ahead with awesome bonuses and boosters!
Form a strategy according to the different items layout in each level and don’t just rush to match items. Always look for opportunities to unlock special boosters, and earn coins in the daily bonus.

Swipe and match your way through new magical game worlds and discover the most addictive matching game. Cookie Crush is a fun match 3 puzzle game taking place in the candy kingdom. Boost your skills, discover yummy candy combos, and win amazing boosters and power-ups that will reward you with high scores.

Notes:
Cookie Crush Match 3 is completely free to play, but some optional in-game items will require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

This game is incredibly fun, super addictive and we can’t promise you won't fall in love with our awesome and delicious adventure.

Follow us for news, updates and fun surprises!
